chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: What shall we say then? Shall we continue in sin, that grace may abound?
items.plainText: What shall we say then? Shall we continue in sin, that grace may abound?

items.text: God forbid. How shall we, that are dead to sin, live any longer therein?
items.plainText: God forbid. How shall we, that are dead to sin, live any longer therein?

items.text: Know ye not, that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death?
items.plainText: Know ye not, that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death?

items.text: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death: that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father, even so we also should walk in newness of life.
items.plainText: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death: that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father, even so we also should walk in newness of life.

items.text: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death, we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection:
items.plainText: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death, we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection:

items.text: Knowing this, that our old man is crucified with him, that the body of sin might be destroyed, that henceforth we should not serve sin.
items.plainText: Knowing this, that our old man is crucified with him, that the body of sin might be destroyed, that henceforth we should not serve sin.

items.text: For he that is dead is freed from sin.
items.plainText: For he that is dead is freed from sin.

items.text: Now if we be dead with Christ, we believe that we shall also live with him:
items.plainText: Now if we be dead with Christ, we believe that we shall also live with him:

items.text: Knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more; death hath no more dominion over him.
items.plainText: Knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more; death hath no more dominion over him.

items.text: For in that he died, he died unto sin once: but in that he liveth, he liveth unto God.
items.plainText: For in that he died, he died unto sin once: but in that he liveth, he liveth unto God.

items.text: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin, but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord.
items.plainText: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin, but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord.

items.text: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body, that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof.
items.plainText: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body, that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof.

items.text: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin: but yield yourselves unto God, as those that are alive from the dead, and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God.
items.plainText: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin: but yield yourselves unto God, as those that are alive from the dead, and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God.

items.text: For sin shall not have dominion over you: for ye are not under the law, but under grace.
items.plainText: For sin shall not have dominion over you: for ye are not under the law, but under grace.

items.text: What then? shall we sin, because we are not under the law, but under grace? God forbid.
items.plainText: What then? shall we sin, because we are not under the law, but under grace? God forbid.

items.text: Know ye not, that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey, his servants ye are to whom ye obey; whether of sin unto death, or of obedience unto righteousness?
items.plainText: Know ye not, that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey, his servants ye are to whom ye obey; whether of sin unto death, or of obedience unto righteousness?

items.text: But God be thanked, that ye were the servants of sin, but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you.
items.plainText: But God be thanked, that ye were the servants of sin, but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you.

items.text: Being then made free from sin, ye became the servants of righteousness.
items.plainText: Being then made free from sin, ye became the servants of righteousness.

items.text: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh: for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness.
items.plainText: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh: for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness.

items.text: For when ye were the servants of sin, ye were free from righteousness.
items.plainText: For when ye were the servants of sin, ye were free from righteousness.

items.text: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed? for the end of those things is death.
items.plainText: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed? for the end of those things is death.

items.text: But now being made free from sin, and become servants to God, ye have your fruit unto holiness, and the end everlasting life.
items.plainText: But now being made free from sin, and become servants to God, ye have your fruit unto holiness, and the end everlasting life.

items.text: For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
items.plainText: For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
